00001 #include "cairotest.h"
00002 #include <QPainter>
00003 
00004 CairoTest::CairoTest() {
00005     setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoBackground, true);
00006 }
00007 
00008 void
00009 CairoTest::drawPath(cairo_t *cr, int w, int h) {
00010     cairo_set_line_width(cr, (w>h) ?h/10.0 : w/10.0);
00011     cairo_move_to (cr, 0.5*w, 0.1*h);
00012     cairo_line_to (cr, 0.9*w, 0.9*h);
00013     cairo_rel_line_to (cr, -0.4*w, 0.0);
00014     cairo_curve_to (cr, 0.2*w, 0.9*h, 0.2*w, 0.5*h, 0.5*w, 0.5*h);
00015     cairo_stroke (cr);
00016 }
00017 
00018 void
00019 CairoTest::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* event) {
00020     int w = width();
00021     int h = height();
00022 
00023     // create a buffer
00024     m_buffer = QImage(w, h, QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied);
00025     uchar *bits = m_buffer.bits();
00026 
00027     // initialize cairo
00028     cairo_surface_t *cs = cairo_image_surface_create_for_data(bits,
00029         CAIRO_FORMAT_ARGB32, w, h, 4*w);
00030     cairo_t *c = cairo_create(cs);
00031     QColor bg = palette().color(QPalette::Background);
00032     cairo_set_source_rgb(c, bg.redF(), bg.greenF(), bg.blueF());
00033     cairo_rectangle(c, 0, 0, w, h);
00034     cairo_fill(c);
00035     QColor fg = palette().color(QPalette::Foreground);
00036     cairo_set_source_rgb(c, fg.redF(), fg.greenF(), fg.blueF());
00037 
00038     // do the drawing
00039     drawPath(c, w, h);
00040 
00041     // clean up
00042     cairo_destroy(c);
00043     cairo_surface_destroy(cs);
00044 }
00045 void
00046 CairoTest::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event) {
00047     QPainter p(this);
00048     p.drawImage(0, 0, m_buffer);
00049 }
